overview: The film tells the story of Hakkarigücü Women’s Football Team. The team is composed of footballers coming from different provinces of Turkey's eastern region with tough geographical conditions, tense political climate and limited educational opportunities. Football means a gate to the outside world for these young footballers ranging from 14 to 21 years old. They transform where they live, achieve to be happy, and enjoy every moment of life despite of all the difficulties. Game means to them more than being the winner of a rivalry, and it is simply a means of making life better.
title: Attack Variations From The Third Zone
